OCD.name: Suggest ISI Author Merges
OCD.description: This algorithm merges all authors with the same name, ignoring punctuation and capitalization. WARNING: the appropriate similarity level depends heavily on the algorithm selected.

AD.name: Similarity 'Metric'
AD.description: The similarity scoring method to use. More information about these metrics and others is available at http://www.dcs.shef.ac.uk/%7Esam/stringmetrics.html

AD.name: Level of similarity required
AD.description: If two nodes are at least this similar, mark that they should be merged.

AD.name: Number of shared first letters
AD.description: Only test two nodes if they share this number of their first letters in common
